title: 25 Font Management Tools Reviewed
content:
Smashing Magazine compiles a list of 25 font management tools for Mac and Windows and gives a pretty comprehensive rundown of features for all.

[http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2008/09/05/25-font-management-tools-revi...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021044141/http:/www.smashingmagazine.com/2008/09/05/25-font-management-tools-reviewed/ "http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2008/09/05/25-font-management-tools-reviewed/")
author: AndrewSipe
